Draft Rating:

F

Chris Grant ranks in the 10th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Grant's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 13 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Jae Crowder with 34th pick but was worth 9th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Anthony Bennett with 1th pick but was worth 35th pick.
  • Drafted Tristan Thompson with 4th pick but was worth 53th pick.
  • Drafted Dion Waiters with 4th pick but was worth 55th pick.

Trade Rating:

F

Chris Grant ranks in the 4th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Luol Deng to CLE.
  • Lost Andrew Bynum, Sir'Dominic Pointer, Paul Zipser, Jordan Bell to CHI.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Milan Mačvan, Jae Crowder, Nemanja Nedović, Timothé Luwawu-Cabarrot to CLE.
  • Lost LeBron James to MIA.
